title: Wonder Woman White Logo Blue Acid Wash Traditional Adjustable Hat for Girls
features: ADJUSTABLE HAT: This hat features an adjustable strap on the back that lets you tighten or loosen the cap for a better fit. With the ability to adjust for size, this hat will last you for years to come.

GRAPHIC DESIGN: A set of two W’s with wings appear in white with red outlines to represent Wonder Woman. Fans of the Amazon warrior will love to celebrate their favorite superhero with this fun design.

BLUE ACID WASH: The faded blue background of this hat will match with most outfits while the red brim will add some color to your wardrobe. Bring some superhero style to your summers with this Wonder Woman hat.

HAND WASH: To clean this hat, wash it by hand in cold water and leave it flat to dry. Once the cap dries, you can wear it as you walk or work under the hot summer day or head to a friend’s house to watch the Wonder Woman movie.

SUN PROTECTION: The wide brim of this hat will protect your face from burning in the hot summer sun and give you some shade to see on bright sunny days, or you can use this hat as protection from the rain, wind, and snow.
description: Celebrate your favorite superhero with this Wonder Woman hat. The cap has a blue acid-washed background and features the hero’s logo in white with a red outline. The cap’s brim comes in an acid-washed red color while the underside is blue with white stars. Fans of Wonder Woman will love this fun design.
